name: Chiharu Truck Defense
description:
You are the best courier in the world. 

The competition wants to eliminate you from the market.

They want to destroy your truck to block your deliveries.

For this reason you have hired a bodyguard with the boomerang.

Avoid and destroy the enemies in order to deliver the goods.

How To Play

To move the truck user the arrows.

To shoot the boomerang use the mouse .

Credits

Design, Development and Graphics :

Mauro Rilla  (https://misterm.itch.io )
